name: UNiagaraValidationRule_TickDependencyCheck
doc: Validation rule to check for unwanted tick dependencies.

Severity: How do we want to repro the error in the stack
bCheckActorComponentInterface: Check that the actor component interface isn't adding a tick dependency on the CPU.
bCheckCameraDataInterface: Check that the camera data interface isn't adding a tick dependency on the CPU.
bCheckSkeletalMeshInterface: Check that the skeletal mesh interface isn't adding a tick dependency on the CPU.
EffectTypesToExclude: If the system uses one of these effect types the rule will not be run.
